about_the_game:
The entire internet has been caught in a loop of ghostly walls, and now it's your turn.

You find yourself trapped in an endless cycle of overtime work, and your heart can barely take the strain.

The company! A byword for terrifying places. An endless stream of deadlines (ddl), and the constant emergence of scapegoats.

Carefully compare everything in the scene with your memories. If you find any discrepancies, turn back immediately! Perhaps then you can work a few less overtime hours.


You must find the boss's office... Maybe you can grab him by the collar and threaten him to take you away from this dreadful place!


But things might not be as simple as they seem...

This game is a short walking simulation PC game that simulates the frantic rush of a corporate slave trying to get off work.

Gameplay:

Meticulously observe the differences between the current floor and the reference floor. If there are no anomalies, proceed to take the elevator B; if anomalies are found, return to the elevator A. Strive to reach the floor where the boss's office is located and put an end to the curse of being unable to leave work.[/list]

Game Duration:

Approximately 60-180 minutes.

Players take on the role of a corporate slave trapped in the cyclical floors of the company, searching for a way out. As you search through each floor, humor and scapegoats fly side by side.

Between laughter and tears, the corporate slaves may find a ray of sunlight at midnight.

The ending you witness might only be the tip of the iceberg of reality; only the true corporate slave, daring to go through multiple rounds of trials, can discover the answer to their fate.

content_descriptors.notes:
1. Blood may appear on some of the object.
2. Two girls may wear bikini or bunny costume.
3. Well-packed condoms may appear in the scene.

name: Overtime Heroes Exit 8

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600 equivalent or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / RX 580 equivalent or greater
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You are in A CORPORATE SLAVE walking simulator. Being trapped in an infinite loop space, you just wanna find way to get off. Find out the anomalies in floors and choose the elevator carefully! Only the correct one can get you out.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
